posts.title: hello-world
posts.text: Hexoé¦–é¡µ Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new posthexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run serverhexo server More info: Server Generate static fileshexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote siteshexo deploy More info: Deployment
